revised_title: Gold Leaf's Physical Properties and High-Temperature Transparency
tldr: This article discusses experiments conducted on gold leaf at high temperatures. The authors found that gold leaf becomes transparent when heated in contact with glass. They discovered that gold leaf contracts at a certain temperature, which is independent of the tension in the leaf. This contraction explains the increase in transparency when gold leaf is heated on glass. The authors also propose a possible explanation for this phenomenon based on surface tension and rigidity.
